tweets.html:
This is like the weirdest episode of VH1's Behind the Music ever. #ReadyforLove

— Austin Morris, Real Housewife of Madison (@austindotTV) April 10, 2013

GODDAMMIT IS ANYONE WATCHING "READY FOR LOVE" I HAVE A REALLY GOOD "POETIC JUSTICE" JOKE

— Kathy Cacace (@kathycacace) April 10, 2013

"It's like 'The Biggest Loser', only instead of body weight, the contestants shed self-esteem!" -- pitch for "Ready for Love"

— Tim Carvell (@timcarvell) April 10, 2013

The women are literally in boxes. IN BOXES. #ReadyForLove makes #Bachelor look like a feminist manifesto.

— Andy Dehnart (@realityblurred) April 10, 2013

So did Leah or didn't she? "I don't want to put it in these other girls' faces." Just Tim's, right? #readyforlove

Okay I can't take any more of #ReadyForLove. Maybe ever. I'm going to switch to Alien vs. Predator, which seems more genuine.
